Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2012 09:52PM klynnz wrote: Formygirls, I have no idea how you must be feeling. I want to speak only for myself. I did a pbmx for my little man. I did it because my mom is stage 4 Mets to bone and brain. Prognosis 2 to 6 months. I'm older, but the memories I have of my mother will always be my precious gifts and NEVER burdens or sources of pain. I was blessed with the opportunity to make another amazing one this last week. Your love is their greatest blessing. Forgive me if I've offended you. You are in my prayers.
Posts.Title: Coping as a young mom? rosasmommy klynnz

Posts.Content: Jan 13, 2012 06:46PM klynnz wrote: My answers are the same as lisamg but I have scars visible only when naked or in a bikini. The drains caused 2 small scars under each armpit. My nipple sparing mastectomy scars go from armpit to nipple. I'm fine with all my scars.
